column4: someone can help me with these errors in make? http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/491529/
what are you compiling?
fortran source code
that you wrote?
when i try to do make, it show me these errors, i have tried to install mpi libraries but doesn't work
and my question?
i'm installing a software. I haven't write these fortran code
the less vague you are, the easier we can help you.
have you read my paste?
yes.
so you don't know how to solve the problem
I cannot help you if you don't answer my questions, no
i answered you :)
k
i'm following a tutorial to install a software, but make command show me errors in the paste
look, I can't help you if you don't answer my question.  If you don't want to tell me what you are compiling for whatever reason, ask the channel for help
i'm compiling a configuration for a software called NEMO, the configuration is called ORCA2_LIM
you read its documentation and made sure you had the required dependencies.  Do you have a link for this project?
yes but you must log in to see the documentation
honestly the errors look like bugs.  Did you try contacting the project (forums, mailing list, their own irc channel, whatever?)
do you think that these are errors in fortran programming?
well they say you need to pass the -fwhateveryourpastebinsays switch to (I guess) gfortran
is it an error on gfortran option?
it looks like that switch needs to be passed, your best bet is contacting upstream support
